subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Literally "hair of eye". Compound of {{m|ja|目|tr=ma||eye}}, {{m|ja|つ|tr=tsu|pos=genitive case}}, and {{m|ja|毛|tr=ke||hair}}. Final -ke voices to -ge due to [[w:Rendaku|rendaku]].

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|まつげ}}

# [[eyelash]]es
#* c. '''790''': ''Daihannya-kyō Ongi'' (Ishiyamadera manuscript, page 34)
#*: 眼睫 [...] 倭言'''麻都竒'''
